io.jenetics.prngine

Class LCG64ShiftRandom.ThreadSafe

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • io.jenetics.prngine.PRNG
        • io.jenetics.prngine.Random64
          • io.jenetics.prngine.LCG64ShiftRandom
            • io.jenetics.prngine.LCG64ShiftRandom.ThreadSafe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    LCG64ShiftRandom

    public static final class LCG64ShiftRandom.ThreadSafe
extends LCG64ShiftRandom
    This is a thread safe variation of the this PRNG—by synchronizing the random number generation.
    Since:
    1.1
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Franz Wilhelmst√∂tter
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • nextLong

        public long nextLong()
        Description copied from class: Random64
        Force to explicitly override the Random.nextLong() method. All other methods of this class are implemented by calling this method.
        Overrides:
        nextLong in class LCG64ShiftRandom

      • split

        public void split(int p,
                  int s)
        Description copied from class: LCG64ShiftRandom
        Changes the internal state of the PRNG in a way that future calls to LCG64ShiftRandom.nextLong() will generated the sth sub-stream of pth sub-streams. s must be within the range of [0, p-1). This method is mainly used for parallelization via leap-frogging.
        Overrides:
        split in class LCG64ShiftRandom
        Parameters:
        p - the overall number of sub-streams
        s - the sth sub-stream

      • jump2

        public void jump2(int s)
        Description copied from class: LCG64ShiftRandom
        Changes the internal state of the PRNG in such a way that the engine jumps 2s steps ahead.
        Overrides:
        jump2 in class LCG64ShiftRandom
        Parameters:
        s - the 2s steps to jump ahead.

      • jump

        public void jump(long step)
        Description copied from class: LCG64ShiftRandom
        Changes the internal state of the PRNG in such a way that the engine jumps s steps ahead.
        Overrides:
        jump in class LCG64ShiftRandom
        Parameters:
        step - the steps to jump ahead.
